text: Jens Weidmann (born 20 April 1968) is a German economist. He was the president of the Deutsche Bundesbank from 2011 until 2021.Black, Jeff and Simon Kennedy, "Draghi Courts Bundesbank in Bid to Avoid Trichet's Bond Fate", Bloomberg News via San Francisco Chronicle, December 8, 2011. Retrieved 2011-12-08. He is also chairman of the Board of the Bank for International Settlements since 2015. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:German economists Category:German bankers
title: Jens Weidmann
